languages.text: "Тише. Лоутон был дураком и трусом, таким и помер. Не надо о нем вслух".

traits.locale_text: "Тише. Лоутон был дураком и трусом, таким и помер. Не надо о нем вслух".

languages.text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."
languages.original_text: "Тише. Лоутон был дураком и трусом, таким и помер. Не надо о нем вслух".

traits.locale_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died one too. Let's not talk about him."
"Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died one too. Let's not talk about him."
"Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died one too. Let's not talk about him."
"Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died one too. Let's not talk about him."
"Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."
"Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

languages.text: 「やめろ。ローソンは脳なしで臆病者として死んだんだ。あいつの話はよそう」
languages.original_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

traits.locale_text: 「やめろ。ローソンは脳なしで臆病者として死んだんだ。あいつの話はよそう」

languages.text: « Ça suffit. Lowthon était un trouillard sans cervelle, et c'est comme ça qu'il est mort. Ne parlons pas de lui. »
languages.original_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

traits.locale_text: « Arrête. Lowthon était un trouillard sans cervelle, et c'est comme ça qu'il est mort. Ne parlons pas de lui. »

languages.text: “别再提了。洛森是个没脑子的懦夫，而且他也死了，别再提这个人了。”
languages.original_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

traits.locale_text: “别再提了。洛森是个没脑子的懦夫，而且他也死了，别再提这个人了。”

languages.text: "Hört auf! Lowthon war ein hirnloser Feigling und ist auch als solcher gestorben. Wir sollten gar nicht über ihn reden."
languages.original_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf! Lowthon war ein hirnloser Feigling und ist auch als solcher gestorben. Wir sollten gar nicht über ihn reden."

languages.text: «Basta. Lowthon no era más que un cobarde, y murió como tal. Es mejor no hablar de él».
languages.original_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

traits.locale_text: «Basta. Lowthon no era más que un cobarde, y murió siendo un cobarde. Es mejor no hablar de él».

languages.text: "Kes. Lowthon, beyinsiz bir ödlekti ve ödlek olarak öldü. Ondan konuşmayalım."
languages.original_text: "Stop. Lowthon was a brainless coward, and he died a coward. Let's not talk about him."

traits.locale_text: "Kes. Lowthon beyinsiz bir ödlekti ve bir ödlek olarak öldü. Ondan konuşmayalım."
